description:
Nadeshiko is back! Amu goes to see her after noticing that she`d be performing at a Fujisaki house dance recital, but Nagihiko is all worried she`ll discover the truth. Despite the help of a miraculous (?) assist from Rima, just as things were starting up again an X egg appears, so Nadeshiko...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おかえり! なでしこ!
